animeDescription: Ano Ko ni 1000% is a high school love story. Azusa Kawahara is the soccer team manager, and her love for childhood playmate Ikumi is mutual. Although the whole school knew what was happening between Azusa and Ikumi, there were rivals who came between them.  (Source: Wikipedia)
animeStaff: [['Fujiyama Fusanobu', ['Sound Director']], ['Kitagawa Miyuki', ['Original Creator']], ['Harada Souichirou', ['Music']], ['Izawa Harumi', ['Key Animation', 'Animation Director', 'Character Design']]]
